'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The operator of the Port Maje trading post, with supplies ''for paying customers''.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Ship supplies. Unique offer includes the [Strange Tablet](/strangeTablet/), [Death's Maw](/deathsMaw/), [Battle-worn Grimoire (Deadfire)](/battleWornGrimoireDeadfire/), and [Ring of Minor Deflection](/ringOfMinorDeflection/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
